dimension: 13 x 9 3/8 x 1/2 in. (33.02 x 23.81 x 1.27 cm) (book only, closed)
title: The Copenhagen Haggadah (Facsimile)
text: This Haggadah illustrates two components of the Passover festival: the "Matza," or unleavened bread, on the right page, and the "Maror," or bitter herbs, on the left.
description:
(a) brown covered book with gold decorative elements on cover; booklet inserted into center of book (b); slipcover (c); 
Original made in Altona-Hamburg
creditline: Gift of Harold and Mickey Smith
